result.title: Summary of Deep Learning Research Trends and Country-Specific Differences from Topic Modeling Analysis
result.introduction: The provided context describes a study that systematically analyzed deep learning research trends over the past ten years using text mining and LDA based topic modeling analysis. The study aimed to identify trends by topic and differences among major research countries.
result.main_body: A study was conducted to analyze deep learning research trends over the past decade. This analysis involved collecting research literature on deep learning and performing an LDA based topic modeling analysis. The study specifically aimed to analyze trends by topic over the ten-year period. Furthermore, it sought to identify differences among major research countries, including China, the United States, South Korea, and the United Kingdom. While the context indicates that such an analysis was performed and that differences were identified, the specific main findings from the topic modeling analysis regarding the detailed trends by topic over the ten years are not provided. Similarly, the specific country-specific differences observed across all mentioned countries are not detailed, beyond a separate document mentioning China's deep learning development in applications like computer vision, voice recognition, and natural language processing.
result.conclusion: In conclusion, a systematic analysis using LDA based topic modeling was performed to understand deep learning research trends over the last ten years and to identify country-specific differences among China, the United States, South Korea, and the United Kingdom. The context confirms the execution of this analysis and the identification of such differences, but it does not elaborate on the specific main findings of the topic trends or the detailed country-specific distinctions.

--- Question ---
Can you summarize the main findings from the topic modeling analysis of deep learning research trends over the past ten years, including country-specific differences?

queries.query: Can you summarize the main findings from the topic modeling analysis of deep learning research trends over the past ten years, including country-specific differences?

hits.title: Deep Learning Research Trend Analysis using Text Mining
hits.abstract: Since the third artificial intelligence boom was triggered by deep learning, it has been 10 years. It is time to analyze and discuss the research trends of deep learning for the stable development of AI. In this regard, this study systematically analyzes the trends of research on deep learning over the past 10 years. We collected research literature on deep learning and performed LDA based topic modeling analysis. We analyzed trends by topic over 10 years. We have also identified differences among the major research countries, China, the United States, South Korea, and United Kingdom. The results of this study will provide insights into research direction on deep learning in the future, and provide implications for the stable development strategy of deep learning.
hits.author: nan

In this regard, this study systematically analyzes the trends of research on deep learning over the past 10 years. We collected research literature on deep learning and performed LDA based topic modeling analysis. We analyzed trends by topic over 10 years. We have also identified differences among the major research countries, China, the United States, South Korea, and United Kingdom. The results of this study will provide insights into research direction on deep learning in the future, and provide implications for the stable development strategy of deep learning.
